title: RIP, IG Shoppers 2.6.20
itunes:title: RIP, IG Shoppers 2.6.20
description:
In episode 564, Jack and Miles are joined by Go Fact Yourself podcasts J. Keith van Straaten to discuss the State of the Union, Instagram pulling in more revenue than Youtube, social detoxing, Chris Rock's Saw reboot, top Valentine candies by state, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Fact-checking the 2020 State of the Union
  2. Trump’s State of the Union suggests he’s worried about Bernie Sanders
  3. Trump Goes On Twitter Tear Over Pelosi Ripping Up His Speech
  4. Instagram Brings In More Than a Quarter of Facebook Sales
  5. Social Detoxing and Solitude: Alone, Lonely, or Aloneliness?
  6. Chris Rock's 'Saw' Reboot Offers Up First Twisted Trailer
  7. Most Popular Valentine's Candy by State [Interactive Map]
  8. WATCH: Shark Tank - Out For A Rip

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
